description: Try our easy to follow Blueberry Slushie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Banana,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Blueberry Slushie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups coconut water (make 1 cup into ice cubs, save 0.5 to soak the chia seeds in)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak chia seeds in coconut water for 10 minutes. Transfer to a blender with ice cubes, blueberries (reserving some of each for garnish) and banana. Add mint and honey to taste. Blend until smooth and thick, adding a little more coconut water for desired consistency. Pour into glasses. Add reserved ice cubes, blueberries and chia seeds.
